segments.text: I simply cannot believe what I am seeing in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can an adult be so completely out of touch with her surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is gushing water, turning the floor into a swimming pool!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's running all over the cabinets; that's just gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, absolutely oblivious, polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children are literally stealing cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating to watch such a lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and fix this whole ridiculous situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of mess and carelessness is quite honestly appalling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water will cause so much damage, it's just a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find the whole situation incredibly frustrating to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She really needs to open her eyes and pay attention!
segments.speaker: PAR
